message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_HOURS_IN_DAY_MAX
message.locale: Number of hours cannot exceed 23.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_MINS_IN_HOUR_MAX
message.locale: Number of minutes cannot exceed 59.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_FUNCTION_FV_FUNCTION_SELECTED_EMPTY
message.locale: A function must be selected as the strategy specified is Allocation Function.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_TARGET_FV_TARGET_SELECTED_EMPTY
message.locale: A target must be selected as the strategy specified is Allocation Target.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_RULESET_FV_FUNCTION_RULESET_EMPTY
message.locale: A rule set must be selected as the strategy specified is Rule Set.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_FV_TASK_DEFINITION_ID_EMPTY
message.locale: The task definition identifier must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_FV_CATEGORY_CODE_EMPTY
message.locale: The category must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_FV_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_CODE_EMPTY
message.locale: The allocation strategy must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_XFV_DEADLINE_TIMEOUT_EMPTY
message.locale: Timeout interval must be specified if a deadline function is selected.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_XFV_PAGE_DESCRIPTION_EMPTY
message.locale: A page description must be entered as a page name has been specified.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_STRATEGY_MANUAL_FUNCTIONS_IDS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: You cannot associate a system allocation strategy with an allocation strategy of manual.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_PAGE_NAME_INCORRECT_FORMAT
message.locale: The page name should not contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_CASE_PARAMETER_NAME_INCORRECT_FORMAT
message.locale: The case parameter name should not contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_PARTICIPANT_PARAMETER_NAME_INCORRECT_FORMAT
message.locale: The participant parameter name should not contain spaces.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_XFV_DEADLINE_FUNCTION_EMPTY
message.locale: A deadline function must be selected as a deadline timeout period has been specified.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_XFV_OVERRIDE_TRUE_TIMEOUT_EMPTY
message.locale: A deadline timeout interval must be entered when the override indicator has been set to true .

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_FV_DUPLICATE_RECORD
message.locale: The Task Definition ID entered has already been assigned to another Task Definition. Please enter a different ID.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_XFV_TASKS_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this definition type while tasks of this type still exist.

message.name: ERR_TASK_XFV_DEFINITION_TYPE_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot create a manual task as a manual task definition does not exist.

message.name: ERR_TASK_DEFINITION_XFV_PAGE_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A page name must be entered as a page description has been specified.
